content: {"name": "Lighthouse Home Missions", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The first is an emergency food program that gets food in the house right away.  Call for an appointment, (Wednesday or Friday, 10am-3pm; 734-326-3885) .\nThe second food program requires the client to take a proactive step in the situation.Call 734-326-3885 Mon or Wed.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.fgtonline.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "34033 Palmer Road", "address_2": "", "city": "Westland", "state_province": null, "postal_code": "48186", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.295185, "longitude": -83.374686}, "phones": [{"number": "(734) 326-3333", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on Christmas & New Year"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
